Release notes

Components

What's fixed

  • Invalid animation value in kendo.common-material.css (#4450)

Calendar

What's fixed

  • Calendar - Calling setOptions will break multiple selection support (#5222)

ComboBox

What's fixed

  • Change event is not triggered, if text() method is used, and when Clear button is clicked to clear the selection (#5237)
  • Click on associated Label with ComboBox, Multiselect and MultiColumnComboBox does not focus the input (#4472)

DatePicker

What's fixed

  • DatePicker calendar is not refreshed after clearing value in picker (#5223)

DateTimePicker

What's fixed

  • DatePicker calendar is not refreshed after clearing value in picker (#5223)
  • The popup.appendTo option is missing for the TimeView popup (#5204)

Draggable

What's fixed

  • Difficulty grouping a grid with a touch and mouse device (#4911)

MobileListView

What's fixed

  • Mobile ListView it does not scroll in iOS13 (#5276)

MultiColumnComboBox

What's fixed

  • Click on associated Label with ComboBox, Multiselect and MultiColumnComboBox does not focus the input (#4472)

MultiSelect

What's fixed

  • MultiSelect selected tags cannot be removed through tag's delete button in iOS 13 Safari (#5342)
  • MultiSelect with autoBind false replaces its value with the one set in its options (#5291)
  • Readonly state is not removed from Kendo MultiSelect on calling the readonly method (#5290)
  • Click on associated Label with ComboBox, Multiselect and MultiColumnComboBox does not focus the input (#4472)

PDFViewer

What's fixed

  • Memory Leak in Kendo PDFViewer when loading files. (#5337)
  • PDFViewer download does not work in iOS 13 (#5336)
  • Wrong scroll position of PDF file content on paging through PDFViewer's Pager and jQuery 3.4.1 (#5322)
  • Search dialog throws an error with jQuery 3.4.x (#5280)
  • Unable to download PDFViewer's PDF file on iOS (#5268)

PivotGrid

What's fixed

  • PivotGrid Configurator messages should not be draggable (#5181)

Scroller

What's fixed

  • Mobile Application with nativeScrolling does not scroll on device with iOS 13.1 (#5289)

Window

What's fixed

  • Window animation duration option is not applied correctly (#5269)
  • Window title method does not remove the wrapper padding (#5260)
